column4: so, I upgraded ubuntu to the latest, and I guess it includes gnome 3... problem is that it doesn't really work with some of the compiz plugins I use for accessibility (enhanced desktop zoom and negative are the two main ones).  I'm wondering if there are twe4aks I can make to gnome 3 settings to make it play nicer.   I poked #gnome and #compiz, but haven't gotten a response yet.
it's gnome 2.3x in Natty with the Unity as a Compiz plugin
so just disable the unity plugin?
I don't know, I was just telling you what you were running
